entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023
